title: EPIC-003: Anthropic Client Adapter - Messages API & Streaming

epic.title: External Integrations - LLM Providers & Auth
epic.goal: Integrate with OpenAI and Anthropic APIs for LLM chat, implement JWT validation for authentication

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Async client using anthropic Python SDK or httpx
send_message(model, messages, system_prompt, stream) -> AsyncIterator[str] or str
Streaming via async iterator, yield message chunks
API key from secrets (env var ANTHROPIC_API_KEY), never logged
Unit tests with httpx mock, integration tests with Anthropic API (optional, use mock in CI)
description: Implement async adapter for Anthropic API: send messages (streaming and non-streaming), handle token usage, manage timeouts and retries. Mirror OpenAI adapter interface for swappability.
